snippet.title: Night Run Release Trailer (FREE OPEN BETA LIVE NOW!)
snippet.description:
Big news for us! Night Run open beta is live on Steam, open to the public for FREE to play for next two weeks before full release July 31, join us and try it out!

Go here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2288760/Night_Run/

Click "Request Access" and you'll be let in immediately to download

We're testing for next two weeks! Join us and share your impressions!

---

Learn Unity and game development with experienced indie game developers. Subscribe for tutorials, devlogs, and gamedev advice uploaded weekly.

Visit us on Discord, ask questions and share your work: https://discord.gg/AGHZvCf

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/thousandant

Visit our website: http://thousandant.com
